channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Word for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Word for Android

item.title: CVE-2020-1223|2024-08-04T06:31:59.506Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20word%20for%20android
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Microsoft Word for Android fails to properly handle certain files.To exploit the vulnerability, an attacker would have to convince a user to open a specially crafted URL file.The update addresses the vulnerability by correcting how Microsoft Word for Android handles specially crafted URL files., aka 'Word for Android Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'.
